Write-Up Text: People are abuzz on social media regarding the upcoming federal budget in Australia. Many pertinent issues and potential solutions are being discussed including the government's decision to combat scam texts in the country urging for increased support for young people facing homelessness and proposing an SMS sender ID registry. Others are commenting on the state of Australia's debt and questioning the government's financial plans while some are even jokingly speculating whether the budget has already been delivered.
